page.title: 03A Day in the Life of Julia
page.content: On Saturdays I get up at 9 o'clock. First I have breakfast of weetabix and a cup of milk. Then I wash myself and clean my teeth. I switch on the television at 9.l5a.m. Next I put fresh water in the dog's bowl. After- wards I unlock the door and let the dog out. Then I go inside and dress in my old clothes. I go outside and play swing-tennis. At 2 o'clock I have dinner and a cup of tea. At half past two I change and go shopping. I go to Grandma's. Auntie gives us some pick'n mix sweets. Grandma gives us sweets too. I say goodbye and we go home. I change back into my old clothes to play. I go to bed at half past nine. I read a book before I switch off the light. Then I get back into bed and fall asleep.
